channel.title: «Definitive X» [Stunning server]-[Multi-topic forum] Hurry! Apply today!
channel.description:
[center][url=http://definitivex.netai.net][img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2zydcup.png[/img][/url][/center] [center][IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/97i8v8.png[/img] [size=10pt]Welcome to [b]Definitive X[/b] Development Team[/size]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/dme49j.png[/img] [b]Base:[/b] [i]Shards[/i] [b]Sub-Base:[/b] [i]CreativeScape[/i] Don't know what[i] CreativeScape[/i] is? [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,440915.0.html]Click Here.[/url]
My name is Danny, I have been coding server's for about 4 years now, and just this year i started with Shards. I've been thinking of creating Development Thread for a long while now, so here I am today, making a Development Thread!
[u][b]A couple goals for this server are:[/b][/u] • Make a Rs-2006 server, but with a unique custom vibe, that is both unlike Rs it's self, but also unlike any other Rs Private Server. • Make a stable server that is always online, always stable, no dupes, cheats, glitches, bugs or anything of that sort. • Make sure that no matter what kind of player you are, whether pure, or skill, you will be able to make money, have fun, and always have something to do. • Most of all, BE SUCCESSFUL!
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2mg2jb9.png[/img]
Home is in Port Phasmatys, although we call it "Ghost-Town", or just simply "Home".
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/29mmyr6.png[/img]
Added [b]a lot[/b] of doors, stairs, npcs/shops. • Everything [i]CreativeScape[/i] has, we have. • When we get a proper team going, there will be a load of features! So just wait a lil bit.
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/dpv1uw.png[/img][/center]
[center]Finished Home. All Npc Shops and Dialogues in home area are complete. [/center]
[center][size=12pt][u][b]Pictures:[/b][/u][/size] (more coming soon).
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/4r52yx.png[/img][/center]
[size=14pt][b]Team:[/b][/size]
High Administrator: 1/2 Gfx: 1/3 coders: 1/3 Admin: 0/1 moderator: 0/3 Web Designer/Developer: 0/1
[code]Applying for?: Why should we choose you?: Will you stay dedicated?: Age: Do you think you can get along with other staff?: How many hours a day are you usually on?: Years with Java: (Only Coders need to fill this out Java knowledge?(1/10): Only Coders need to fill this out Proof of any work?: Only Coders need to fill this out)[/code]
I support all compliments and/or criticism so please comment.
[right]-Dfx .[/right]

item.title: «Definitive X» [Stunning server]-[Multi-topic forum] Hurry! Apply today!
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Jagz Mr Jagz
item.description:
@Mr_Jagz wrote:

Applying for?: Web Coder/Designer
Why should we choose you?: Im always ready for the job of website coding and developing. im a person who you can trust and rely on, im highly experienced with Vbulletin/SMF/MyBB/ and all the other ones. Im always into website making/designing and ill be very glad to join this team. I have 2 years experience.
Will you stay dedicated?: Ofcourse i will.
Age:14
Do you think you can get along with other staff?: Thats for sure, i have been staff many times. I respect everyone to gain respect.
How many hours a day are you usually on?: 2 hours on school days, 5+ hours on weekends.

My Msn: jiglowaypk@hotmail.com

I hope i am accepted.
Your sencerely,
Jags (Anthony)

Read full topic

Applying for?: Moderator/Coder

Will you stay dedicated?: Forsure
Age: 15
Do you think you can get along with other staff?: Always
How many hours a day are you usually on?: 6

item.title: «Definitive X» [Stunning server]-[Multi-topic forum] Hurry! Apply today!
item.dc:creator: @Butchd12 Butchd12
item.description:
@Butchd12 wrote:

Applying for?: GFX

Why should we choose you?: My junior year of highschool (last year) I took a 3D animation class, and i learned how to model fairly well, and i can use that program at home to make cool things, it may not be the best for backgrounds, signatures, but i can manage making cool pictures for the server in 3D!

Will you stay dedicated?: I will be on as much as I can, with dealing with my real life.

Age:17 (18 in september 25)

Do you think you can get along with other staff?: Yes, I think I can get along with the other staff members, I consider myself to be a fairly mature person. I love to have a good time, and hang out, so im pretty sure we will get along just fine.

How many hours a day are you usually on?: Im not going to say I can be on the most, But im online as much as I can.

Proof of any work?: These Videos, Are things I’ve made in my 3D class.

YouTube

Maxx Buys

I am a well mannered person. When you get to know me i am quite a good friend.

I know me posting the username for my youtube channel my not be enough, but feel free to drop a message in my box, and il get back to you proving it is me!

Read full topic

item.title: «Definitive X» [Stunning server]-[Multi-topic forum] Hurry! Apply today!
item.dc:creator: @Mr_x1 Mr...x..
item.description:
@Mr_x1 wrote:

Sorry for the very late reply. My family and I went on vacation and I had to put the project on PAUSE during that time.

[quote=“mintzero4, post:2, topic:410545”]Applying for?: Moderator
Why should we choose you?: I am a very good staff and follow the rules
Will you stay dedicated?: Yes i love servers and i stay active
Age:15
Do you think you can get along with other staff?: Yes i dont have a problem with anyone unless they cuss me out or what ever
How many hours a day are you usually on?: 6-8[/quote]
Sorry, you are not accepted.

[quote=“judostar1, post:4, topic:410545”]Applying for?: Moderator/ Coder
Why should we choose you?: I have over 4 months of experience in this position and I’ve never abused my powers. If we are short on coders then I will be pleasured to help out.
Will you stay dedicated?: I’ll try my best, because school is coming up soon.
Age: 15 almost 16
Do you think you can get along with other staff?: Yes as long as they accept my personal space.
How many hours a day are you usually on?: Right now about 6 hours, during school days about 2 hrs, and weekends about 4 or 5 hours.
Years with Java: 1 (Only Coders need to fill this out
Java knowledge?(1/10): 7 Only Coders need to fill this out
Proof of any work?: search for armscape on google, go on forum and try to find some pics. Only Coders need to fill this out)
I would like to know more about you, do you have msn or skype? Add coolman867@live.ca (msn) dannny.clement (skype)[/quote]
I would like to know more about you, do you have msn or skype? Add coolman867@live.ca (msn) dannny.clement (skype)

[quote=“Creede, post:8, topic:410545”]Applying for?: web developer/Gfx designer
Why should we choose you?:I have 3 years of web designing experience and 2 of gfx
Will you stay dedicated?: yes I am very very dedicated
Age: 14
Do you think you can get along with other staff?: Yes I love to get along its my soul passion
How many hours a day are you usually on? 4-10 depending if I have school and when I wana play xbox

I also code mybb or smfnew for web dev and i use photoshop cs5 for my gfx and here is a example of my gfx
[/quote]
Accepted! Please add coolman867@live or dannny.clement

[quote=“Daginith, post:9, topic:410545”]Applying for?:JAVA Server Programmer/Coder
Why should we choose you?: Because i have alot of evperence with JAVA
Will you stay dedicated?: yes.
Age: 15
Do you think you can get along with other staff?: Yes, if they get along with me.
How many hours a day are you usually on?: 3+
Years with Java: 3 years.
Java knowledge? 7-8/10
Only Coders need to fill this outProof of any work?: Will show screenshots of my old servers or code upon request. [/quote]
Again, I would like to know more about you, please add coolman867@live.ca or dannny.clement

[quote=“soul my maul, post:7, topic:410545”]Applying for?: Website Developer
Why should we choose you?: Im sexy
Will you stay dedicated?: Yeah
Age: 15
Do you think you can get along with other staff?: yup
How many hours a day are you usually on?: 5

Add me on MSN formationx1@hotmail.com or Pm me[/quote]
Wanna know more about you, and what kind of things you work with. Please add coolman867@live.ca or dannny.clement

One: its 2006 based the guys has torva

Two: There are liek 10+ “recreate 2006” threads

Three: Your going from 2011 to 2006, that’s a step backwards.

Not flaming just my thoughts, other then that, Best of luck![/quote]

item.title: «Definitive X» [Stunning server]-[Multi-topic forum] Hurry! Apply today!
item.dc:creator: @Mr_x1 Mr...x..
item.description:
@Mr_x1 wrote:

[center][/center]
[center]
[size=10pt]Welcome to Definitive X
Development Team[/size]


Base: Shards
Sub-Base: CreativeScape
Don’t know what CreativeScape is? Click Here.

My name is Danny, I have been coding server’s for about 4 years now, and just this year i started with Shards. I’ve been thinking of creating Development Thread for a long while now, so here I am today, making a Development Thread!

A couple goals for this server are:
• Make a Rs-2006 server, but with a unique custom vibe, that is both unlike Rs it’s self, but also unlike any other Rs Private Server.
• Make a stable server that is always online, always stable, no dupes, cheats, glitches, bugs or anything of that sort.
• Make sure that no matter what kind of player you are, whether pure, or skill, you will be able to make money, have fun, and always have something to do.
• Most of all, BE SUCCESSFUL!

Home is in Port Phasmatys, although we call it “Ghost-Town”, or just simply “Home”.

Added a lot of doors, stairs, npcs/shops.
• Everything CreativeScape has, we have.
• When we get a proper team going, there will be a load of features!
So just wait a lil bit.

[/center]

[center]Finished Home.
All Npc Shops and Dialogues in home area are complete.
[/center]

[center][size=12pt]Pictures:[/size] (more coming soon).

[/center]

[size=14pt]Team:[/size]

High Administrator: 1/2
Gfx: 1/3
coders: 1/3
Admin: 0/1
moderator: 0/3
Web Designer/Developer: 0/1

Applying for?: Why should we choose you?: Will you stay dedicated?: Age: Do you think you can get along with other staff?: How many hours a day are you usually on?: Years with Java: (Only Coders need to fill this out Java knowledge?(1/10): Only Coders need to fill this out Proof of any work?: Only Coders need to fill this out)

I support all compliments and/or criticism so please comment.

[right]-Dfx .[/right]

Read full topic
